live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
Our technicians are beginning to restore services to your area.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.

51138.summary: Some customers in Surrey are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
51138.title: July 1 – Surrey | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.

Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
51171.summary: Some customers in the William Whyte area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
51171.title: Jul 1 - Winnipeg (William Whyte) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
